title: The Ritz is always good to stay at
text:
The stay was nice and always nice with the Ritz
The Ritz staff are always nice as always and thanks everyone I met
Room was excellent with nice bed, coffee and tea and all other stuff. WiFi was very good.
Hotel location is very good. About 5-7 mins walk to the metro and near to Dubai mall (7mins by car and 20 mins walk).
The gym was good and 24hours
Breakfast was good but could be better
Below are some pictures of my stay
place: The Ritz-Carlton, Dubai International Financial Centre

title: Great location
text: The hotel was nice with great location. I came early but couldn’t check-in till around 2pm which was inconvenient specially after a very long flight around 9 hours. The room was good with comfortable beds. Breakfast was good too. Just one of the receptionist staff was not nice and I think he needs some training. The other receptionist was really nice who did our check-in

title: Fair in general
text: It was clean and staff were nice and helpful. The location was ok not too far from the central station and the center. The room was small for two persons. Bed was really tiny, I almost fell down from the bed many times.

title: Excellent breakfast and coffee
text: This is a great place to have a breakfast. Coffee was really great. Service was excellent too. Recommend.

title: Great steak
text: Nice place with a very great steak, lamb and steak are perfect. I will attach some pictures of our orders. The meat balls and goat cheese salad were very nice too

title: Nice experience
text:
I’ve been in this restaurant twice. It has nice location with nice environment and nice decor.
The food was really good and customers can cook their food for BBQ inside the restaurant.
Here some photos

title: Nice environment and location
text:
I came here before for lunch and was excellent. This time we came for breakfast. The food was ok. Environment and location are excellent. They need to work on the service and become faster.
They are working to have the service better and wish you luck
Here photos from our breakfast

title: Nice restaurant and coffee
text: I like the food there. I’ve tried many dishes and I like most of them. Only the soup was not excellent but the rest were very nice. Sweet and coffee was great too. I’ll attach pictures of the food we had and from inside

title: Good place in khober
text: Khober cornich is a nice place for family and friends. It has a nice walking track for people like to walk. It has nice restaurants and coffee shops. Plus there are few stores for shopping. In general it’s a nice place and good spot in khober city

title: Lack of services and entertainment
text: The beac is good but doesn’t really have services like restaurants entertainment. Just toilets that need to be cleaned and more maintained. The water not really clear and clean as I dived there once and wasn’t really good and nothing interesting there. The beach needs a lot of care and maintenance

title: Must visit in Barcelona
text: I’ve been there twice. First time as a tour and second time for a match and both of them were great and really enjoyed. It’s a must visit place when visiting Barcelona. I recommend both the tour and attending a match which really a great experience.

title: Best shopping mall in Eastern
text: It’s the best shopping mall in the eastern Province, it’s has all international brands for shopping and many restaurants and coffee shops. It’s good for shopping or going to have coffee or eat.

title: Good shopping mall for quick shopping
text: Good place for shopping. It has some good shops but not too many. It’s good for quick shopping. It has some fast food restaurants and coffee shops with big parking lots. The mall mainly for families.

title: Poor and very old
text:
I just want to mention in the beginning that I like this airline in general and I used it many times but I’m reviewing my last trip which was very poor.
The flight TK0152 was really bad for the following:
This flight can’t be used for international especially for big company and not cheap.
It’s very old and small flight. Very old screen tv that has nothing. The screen always on and bothering that can’t sleep. The screen has no entertainment only to bother.
The previous flight from Athens to Istanbul which about only one hour and half was much better.
Second, the crew was not professional, they just like to bother and it seems they mean it. Whenever they see you sleep they wake you up for no reason. I didn’t touch my seat once I sit on it but the air hostess kept coming to me to sit it up which really annoying. When serving food, I got water on me like she didn’t care.
I’ve been traveling on regular and this plane haven’t seen them for ages.

title: Very nice hotel
text:
I really like the hotel. It’s 4 star hotel but better than some 5 star hotels I’ve been in Greece.
The room was really nice.
The staff very friendly and helpful and I got an upgrade.
Gym wasn’t wow but good.
Breakfast was very nice with many options.
Value of money was very good.
Actually everything was great but it’s about a mile from the center which was not a big deal for me.
WiFi was great.
Here are some photos of my stay.

title: Amazing view
text:
I really like scenery and breakfast.
Staff were very friendly.
Pool was nice.
Location was good with free shuttle to the city center.
However, WiFi was very bad and no network for mobile in the room like I had to go out side to call or use my internet data.
No ventilation in the bathroom.
Too many steps. Flooring in the room makes it very dangerous to walk with socks or barefoot, needs an area carpet.
No coffee, tea, and kettle in the room.
Wish there was agm
Here are some photos of my stay

title: Was normal
text:
We used the cable car from the bottom to the top for 6 euros each, I feel like little expensive for that very short trip.
Going up can be done walking, by donkeys, or the cable car

title: Was ok
text:
We went all the way down but be aware of donkeys because riders don’t know how to control them and can hit you. Then we went up by the cable car for 6 euros which is too much for that short ride
There was not much to do down only the port with couple stores
Some photos here:

title: Normal
text:
It was nice but not special or must to see
It is like any church but was in the 1800s
Here are some photos
place: Cathedral of Saint John the Baptist

title: Good but little pricey
text:
Food was good but definitely not authentic Mexican food.
A little pricey
The location was good for us since we where staying in volcano view hotel
Here are some pictures of our order and the place.

title: Great value for the stay
text:
It was conveniently located to many beaches and easy to get to the city center by bus.
WiFi was very good
Breakfast was good.
Very nice and helpful staff.
Iron clothes can’t be done in rooms only down
I’ll attach some photos of the stay

title: A nice place to stay at
text: Plaka is a nice area to stay at when visiting Athens or at least you visit. It has many stores and restaurants and taverna . It’s very close to syntagma square where the buses and metros go to almost everywhere including airport.

title: Must visit when visiting Mykonos
text: It’s a nice place that must visi while visiting Mykonos. Old and traditional stores and restaurants. The best time to visit while the sunset. Many people go there to watch the sunset. I’ll attach the sunset picture here

title: Quiet beach
text:
The beach is quiet and water was clear
I visited the beach at the end of April so it was quite. Maybe in the summer will be more busy
The beach is good for relaxing

title: Good but expensive
text:
Nice atmosphere with good location
Food and service were good. However, it’s a little bit expensive.

title: Super unorganized
text:
We had ferry with (NISSOS MYKONOS) from Athens to Mykonos
There was no clear guidance when boarding the ferry. People in the economy can do whatever they want since there was no asinged seats.
There were 2 guys who were reserving 6 seats. 2 for them, 2 in front of them reserved them by putting coats , and 2 next to them so they had a very larg space for them with no supervision.
Some people had many seats while others had no seats. That was really bad
Plus, the ferry delayed for more than 2 hours at the last time after we left to the port
It was really a bad experience

title: Must see
text:
It’s a must to see in Athens.
It’s a short visit which cost 20 euros
We enjoyed it and was the most important thing to do in Athens

title: Great location but..
text:
The location was excellent
The breakfast was very good. However, I didn’t feel it was a 5 star hotel. The room was tiny. The Bathroom was tiny with no tub and small shower. Felt like 3 star hotel The gym was really bad with one treadmill, one elliptical, one bench, one machine that has everything but was not working and very few light weights. WiFi was bad Swimming pool was small
Here are some pictures of my stay

title: Delicious
text:
We had a dinner for two. The good was god and service was excellent with nice view
Zucchini was very salty
The two main deshes were nice past and beef
At the end they serviced us a traditional sweet
Here are some photos

title: Good Greek restaurant in the center
text:
I like the place and the service and the prices were acceptable. The food was ok but not wow
Here are some photos of our orders

title: Expensive with normal food and service
text:
We had a lunch but the type of food and service is average but the prices are high
They have business lunch for workers but they’re close at noon for prayer while the lunch time is at that time
It was ok but I don’t think I’ll visit it again. Plus the price was 55 which tax not included and no drink as well

title: Great place for meat
text:
We ordered many plates and most of them are really great, the place is nice and restaurant is clean
Prices are acceptable
Ribs and brisket are good

title: Nice atmosphere
text:
I like the restaurant, the atmosphere and decoration very nice. They have different types of food and even for breakfast. Sweet and coffee too
We had almost everything there and most of the dishes are nice
I like the chicken BBQ salad
The lamb and steak are good
I’ll attach the dishes we ordered

title: Nice place
text:
I tried many dishes food and sweet but I like the sweet and coffee more. The place is very nice with inside and outside tables.
Service was good
I like the ribs the most but the other dishes were ok
Sweet and coffee were better

title: Good place for lunch
text:
I like to have lunch here from time to time. It’s a very nice Italian restaurant.
They have a lunch offer that started from SR 49
Salad, soup, bread, drink, main dish, and ice cream
It’s really good and their salad fresh and great
I’ll attach pics from my meal

title: Normal
text:
The airline is good but there are couple things I didn’t like
1- the seat on the emergency exit doesn’t move which makes it impossible to take a nap or sleep with straight seat.
2- a long flight about 9 hours and half from Manila to Abu Dhabi they served only one small meal and one small sandwich as snack after about 6 hours. Com’n that’s really cheap.

Other things were ok

title: Nice stay in makati
text:
We booked 3 nights here for Two-Bedroom Deluxe Suite. It’s big and nice with nice staff.
Bed was comfortable
Clean and quiet. Had no problem sleeping day or night.
Breakfast was good
The gym was really good, big, and equipped with almost everything needed. It also has lockers and showers
The room has almost everything but didn’t use them like kitchen, cloth cleaning machine,....
I’ll attach some photos from my stay

title: Nice place for breakfast
text: I came here with a friend and I liked the place and the prices. It’s good all time but I think breakfast will be the best. Tea and karak are great specially the karak. They baked the buns there and taste good. I tried the egg bun was really good and tried beef burger the signature was really good. Juices are good as well. The prices are acceptable. I’ll attach some pictures

title: Nice place to visit
text:
It’s a nice place to visit when you travel to Sri Lanka. I recommend this attraction. It cost about lkr 4500.
You need to be prepared to clime. We had difficulties because of the heavy rain that day. Umbrella is a must if it’s raining and wear confortable clothes and shoes. It’s very nice and you will enjoy. I’ll share a picture

title: Fair
text:
The flight was good. It took me about 5 hours from Dammam to Colombo as direct flight.
The flight was fair and good comparing to the price.
Staff were nice. Meal was good. I just didn’t like how they serve water as they fill it from a tap

title: Good but I think it’s overpriced
text: The driver took us here and there was a man we was with us explained most of the product there and how they make them. It was a good tour but I think it’s overpriced.

title: Good hotel with some issues
text:
The hotel was nice and clean. Located in the beach with a small swimming pool. It has small gym. It has a library where you can sit and read.
The breakfast was good just they need to cover everything because no flys or anything can reach.
Wifi coverage was ok but slow.
The bed and pillows were not good and not comfortable. They put two single beds together to make it as one queen size but in the middle there was an empty space which made it inconvenient.
There was little nose from the street during day and night.
There were not many things near the hotel for walking distance as the hotel is out of the city.
Overall it was good
I’ll share some pictures

title: Was ok but not great
text:
It was ok but not great at all. I thought it would be better. They just take u in a boat first for fish foot massage then to show u cinnamon and if u want to buy. For me it wasn’t excellent plus I have been to a spice garden and bought cinnamon so this wasn’t great but ok. I feel the price little high. The driver told me to pay $25 but I paid 4000 LKR which little less than $25 but still high.
I don’t really recommend this trip

title: Good but waiting time is long
text:
The restaurant was good and clean but the take ages to serve you. We kept waiting till someone came to take order. Then, we waited very long time to brought the food.
I like the place and food but it was not organized. They need to more organize.

title: Great view
text: The hotel has a very great view. Room was nice and big. Bed was good. Bathroom was good but too many ants around the sink. They have in the bathroom shaving kit, toothpaste and toothbrush with care kit. No buffet for breakfast but you can order. Breakfast was good. WiFi was really bad. No WiFi in the room. Everybody were outside to be able to connect to WiFi plus me. I’ll share some photos.

title: Nice hotel
text:
The hotel was nice. Room and bed were good and big. Bathroom was ok but needs to be cleaner as there were some insects like spiders. WiFi in the room was not good very low signal as I had to sit down outside to use the WiFi for better connection.
The breakfast was ok but not really good with limited selections.

title: Clean room
text: The hotel was nice with a very good bed. The bathroom was good. WiFi was not good in the room as I had to sit down out to be able to be connected to the WiFi. Breakfast was not that good, there were not many options. I’ll share couple photo

title: Was ok
text:
I stayed two nights in this hotel.
First night the room they gave me was nice and clean. However, there was a problem with the electricity in that building so, they moved us to another building which wasn’t that good. It looks older and bathroom wasn’t clean like the previous one even the towel there was dirty as I’ll post one photo for it. The breakfast wasn’t that good but ok as some food not covered.
There’s no WiFi in room only in public area so, I had to go out whenever I want to us WiFi which is so bad. The staff are nice
I’ll share some photos of the hotel for the first room and the second

title: Was not good
text:
The hotel location is ok and on the beach and staff were nice. However, the hotel is not good.
Mosquitos, spiders, and insects are everywhere in the room, and outside more. It was really bad that can’t sleep with a lot of insects with me in the room.
Wifi is connecting only in the lobby and no WiFi in room.
Furniture very old and some of them broken like the chair and I’ll post a picture of it.
The sheet on bed is dirty and I’ll post a picture of it.
Breakfast is not ok. I just had eggs and banana and coffee because most of the food exposed and you can see insects flying over it that doesn’t feel good. I’ll share some pictures

title: Nice restaurant
text:
I had a snack here with a friend and I had chicken quesadilla which was good. Then I had coffee and was good as well. I like the place. They have breakfast buffet but I was late so I don’t really know how is it.
Chicken quesadilla was for SR 38
Here are some photos

title: Clean issue
text:
We had two pizza with my friend. The restaurant was big and empty. We were watching the chif while cooking. However, one of the workers was helping wit dirty hands and no cloves
The pizza was good

title: Was good but second visit was disappointing
text:
I have visited this restaurant twice. First time I tried it was excellent when I ordered (Mansaf)
Today I ordered steak sandwich was not good as the bread was bad and hard to bite
Plus the ketchup was EXPIRED with dark color
I don’t know how they serve expired food was an expensive restaurant.
The prices not cheap but food wasn’t ok
This time was disappointing and last visit

title: Very nice salad bar
text: I know it’s a steak house and more specialized with steak, but the salad bar is excellent. I go there from time to time for their salad and soup offer. It’s very nice. I’ll attach couple pictures

title: Great attraction in Abu Dhabi
text:
I’ve been in the louvre in Paris before and this time in Abu Dhabi. I really like this one and I feel like anyone who visits Abu Dhabi should visit this nice museum. There’s descriptions on everything in Arabic and English. It was big and worth visiting.
There’s also WiFi in case you need to use it
I’ll attach couple pictures

title: Good airline and good timing
text:
Turkish airline is good, the prices are acceptable and has good timing regarding waiting time in Istanbul. However, on my last trip to Lyon I really didn’t like the meals they provided.
Another issue sometimes we face In Istanbul airport to change the flight. It needs more organized

title: For Dubai is good
text:
First I’ll talk in general about Saudi airlines.
Almost all flights from Dammam has to stop in Jeddah or Riyadh like Dammam is not a major city while Dammam is a major city and we should have direct flights to most of distinctions without stopping in Jeddah or Riyadh.
The second issue is the rate of the tickets
For example if I’m planning to go to Europe I’ll choose different airlines because I’ll find less time and much cheaper rates.
For my trip from Dammam to Dubai was good but I didn’t like the meals the provided. They used to be better but I think they changed.
In general for this trip was good and had no problem

title: Good as value but issue with timing
text:
I tried KLM many times. It has some advantages as value of money, nice air hostesses, food is ok but can be better. Seats are ok.
The main issue and thing I really don’t like and many times I use different airlines is timing.
Most or maybe all flights that coming back from Europe back to home leaves super early. For example my last trip to Barcelona the flight departure was 6am. Why is that early???
That means I have to leave the hotel and checkout before 4am which before the buses and breakfast. Plus, it means I can’t even enjoy my last night cuz I have a super early flight at 6am. I think there’s another flight after 6 but the price is so high more than half of my whole ticket which is not reasonable.
I want to mention another issue I faced from Barcelona back home. I had my carry on bag which not really big. I took it with my from home to Barcelona with no problem but when I’m coming back they told me it’s too big and I can’t take it with me. The problem when I went inside the plane I saw many passengers who have their bag which really bigger than mine. How they allowed them but for my small bag they said it’s too big??!!!

title: Good restaurant, nice staff
text:
We came here with a group of friends. The food was good and staff were nice. The restaurant is big and clean. We started with some burgers and and chilli cheese and jalapeño and wings. They were very chilli for me.
Then we tried 3 types of ribs. Flavour X was the best then old skool BBQ was good too. However, I didn’t like peri peri that much.
Last thing was sweet (waffle with ice cream) was good.
Attach some pictures

title: Very nice place in nature
text:
My friend and I stayed one night in this hotel and it was amazing. Simple place with very nice people there (the owner and people there) you feel like a family.
We wish we could stayed more but we where in bike trip and stayed there
Breakfast was good too
I’d like to tank the family owner there they were very nice and made our stay perfect. Some pictures included

title: Very nice
text:
Very good restaurant in Lyon
Good food
Reasonable prices
Nice staff
The location is great
I recommed this restaurant for lunch when you are in Lyon
